subject: Inheritance $25M
body:
Dear Danny,
Good evening and my client general Barbkov just notified me now about your
message wrongly sent to him instead to me.
Many thanks for your response and I have handled these impostors as they
are now languishing in the prison for attempted fraud.
All you need do urgently as the bequeathed beneficiary is to settle the
court fee $2,110 which is the mandatory submission court fee to enables you
have the ownership certificate legally in your name.
Also I will send you an application of claim form which you are supposed to
fill out correctly and return back which I will use to validate your claim
already filed but must be accompanied with the court fee.
Thanks for your understanding.
Barrister Vincent Shan Esq

subject: Attachments from Barrister Vincent Esq
body:
Dear Danny,
Find attached are the following ,documents issued to the former depositor (
general Barbkov) and copies of my identifications including the application
of claim form you should fill out correctly and return back with the court
submission fee $2,110. All of these were used when I filed application of
claim that these impostors wanted to claim.
I look forward having the application of claim form filled out correctly to
facilitate my movement to the court to validate your claims before issuance
of ownership certificate will given to you.
Thanks
Barrister Vincent Shan Esq
